name: Data 2
description: A couple of years ago by error format the external disk that saved the "memory" with my ten-year work; Sixty gigs erased in a few minutes. It took me a long time to assume the loss and accept the risk involved in digital storage. I am no longer interested in planning field trips to document photographically as I did in the past. My work process changed when I set my gaze over the place you habit. There is an infinite universe to explore. In the usual walks a few blocks from my home I began to be interested in waste that people leave on the streets for the garbage collector truck. Different objects, furniture, chairs, mattresses, and surprisingly a lot of albums, postcards and photographic archive; The latter has filed it, cataloged to turn it into a research body that subsequently digitizing, intervening, trying to put into crisis the concept document, memory and virtulity.AUTHORY RIGHTS AND PRACEWORK Gustavo Solmott. I do not authorize printing.
